#####################
# NEW FUGLU RELEASE #
#####################

Make sure all tests pass
------------------------
cd fuglu/tests
./runtests.py


documentation
-------------
 * update changelog
 * make sure autogenerated plugin doc is up to date

cd fuglu/developerdoc
./make_sphinx_plugin_doc.py > /home/gryphius/gitspace/fuglu.gh-pages/source/includedplugins-autogen.txt
cd /home/gryphius/gitspace/fuglu.gh-pages/
make html

(check index.html, push to git if ok)

* update default config

fuglu_conf -m all > conf/fuglu.conf.dist
(commit to git)

deploy
------
* update version in fuglu/__init__.py, commit to git

* tag release
git tag -a 0.6.1 -m 'tag 0.6.1'
git push --tags origin master

* build
python setup.py sdist

* pypi upload
python setup.py sdist upload


* mailing list announcement
